setting.name: uri
setting.description: The AOR for this agent. This attribute is also the index attribute for this object class.

setting.name: name
setting.description: A short descriptive name for this agent. Used primarily for display purposes.

setting.name: monitor-presence
setting.label: Monitor presence
setting.description: If set, the ACD Server expects the agent station to provide correct information whether the agent is busy or available. If not set, the ACD Server will assume the agent is available whenever the ACD is not sending a call to the agent.

setting.name: always-available
setting.label: Always available
setting.description: If set, the ACD Server will assume that this agent is always signed-in to accept calls from all queues that it is listed with. If not set, the agent must sign in before the ACD Server will send it calls.

setting.name: acd-queue-list
setting.description: The list of ACD Queues that this agent is assigned to. The ACD Queues are identified via a comma-separated list of acd-queue identifiers. The order is relevant as it specifies the priority of the queues in respect to which queue the agent will service should multiple queues attempt to simultaneously route a call to it. The first element in the list is of highest priority.
